explanation: [0-0] Two people are standing in a room. On the left is a person wearing red clothes and a black mask, and on the right is a blond man wearing green clothes. On the right is a pink cabinet, and on the left is a transparent cabinet with many things inside. The wall is gray. There is a "SMOL" logo in the lower right corner.
